TopicTitle: I recently heard about a .mbm-to-.png and reverse converter. Does anyone have a link to it?

Articles.Content:
Hello again! I'm interested in creating my own textures and remakes of the stock parts, but I don't have a way to easily convert .mbm files to .png files and back, so I can't currently. I've heard that there was a program in the past that could convert KSP textures to png's and back, meaning it would be a ton easier to edit textures. If anyone has a link to it, please post it below!

- Avera9eJoe

> 
> Have you looked here [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE)

MeCripp, that page is on the lines of what I want, but it isn't. I want to take the stock textures, and revamp them or edit them. Not create a new part or texture by itself. Thanks though ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-23T05:17:11Z" title="04/23/2015 05:17  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 23, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**
Sorry thought this would have been on the list [https://github.com/krupski/MBM_Utilities](https://github.com/krupski/MBM_Utilities)

> 
> Sorry thought this would have been on the list [https://github.com/krupski/MBM_Utilities](https://github.com/krupski/MBM_Utilities)

![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png) OMG that might be exactly what I'm looking for.

EDIT: Yeah that's exactly what I was looking for. Rep! I highly suggest you post this on the Mod development page and ask for it to be put into texturing. I'm sure I'm not the only one who would benefit. Thanks!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-23T05:33:56Z" title="04/23/2015 05:33  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 23, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**
